agentDefaultMessage: Hello, I'm **{{name}}**. You can start chatting with me right away, or go to [Agent Settings](/chat/settings#session={{id}}) to complete my information.
confirmClearCurrentMessages: You are about to clear the current session messages. Once cleared, they cannot be retrieved. Please confirm your action.
confirmRemoveSessionItemAlert: You are about to delete this agent. Once deleted, it cannot be retrieved. Please confirm your action.

inbox.desc: Activate the brain cluster and spark creative thinking. Your virtual agent is here to communicate with you about everything.
inbox.title: Just Chat

sessionGroup.confirmRemoveGroupAlert: This group is about to be deleted. After deletion, the agents in this group will be moved to the default list. Please confirm your operation.
sessionGroup.tooLong: Group name length should be between 1-20

topic.confirmRemoveAll: You are about to delete all topics. Once deleted, they cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
topic.confirmRemoveTopic: You are about to delete this topic. Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
topic.confirmRemoveUnstarred: You are about to delete unstarred topics. Once deleted, they cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.

guide.desc: Click the button on the left to save the current session as a historical topic and start a new session.
guide.title: Topic List

topic.title: Topic List

upload.disabled: The current model does not support visual recognition. Please switch models to use this feature.
upload.dragDesc: Drag and drop files here, support uploading multiple images. Hold down Shift to send images directly.
upload.dragFileDesc: Drag pictures and files here to support uploading multiple pictures and files. Hold down Shift to send an image or file directly.
